last_scene: Artie met his System Guide, Fizz, in the flickering blue void of character creation.
A residual electrical surge from his death glitched the UI, dumping all his stat points into Critical Probability instead of Vitality.
The System finalized his build as a 'Glass Cannon' with 100% Crit and a precarious 1 HP before transport began.
chapter_so_far: Artie died in a mundane office accident and has been drafted into a System-driven world.
Artie met Fizz and accidentally created a broken 'Glass Cannon' build with 1 HP and 100% Crit rate.
key_facts_ring: Artie is introduced as a cynical office drone carrying a LARP prop (Rusty Shortsword).
A bag of 'Nacho Average Jalapeño' chips gets stuck in the Snack-O-Matic 3000.
Artie attempts to shake the machine and reach into the bin for the chips.
The Rusty Shortsword conducts a fatal electrical surge from a frayed wire into Artie.
Artie dies and his consciousness enters the System Void.
The System mocks Artie's 'Stupidity-Induced Electrical Discharge' and begins character creation.
